languages.text: Семья Драйвстемов, пользуясь связями с Миссией Касбаллики, превратилась в расчетливых и беспринципных дельцов, презирающих закон... Перемены заметили немногие.
The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.
languages.original_text: Семья Драйвстемов, пользуясь связями с Миссией Касбаллики, превратилась в расчетливых и беспринципных дельцов, презирающих закон... Перемены заметили немногие.

traits.locale_text: Drivestem family used their connections in Kasballica Mission and turned into calculating and unscrupulous dealers who despised the law. Few could see the change.
Drivestem family used their connections in Kasballica Mission and turned into calculating and unscrupulous dealers who despised the law. Few could see the change.
The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who despised the law. Few noticed the change.

The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.
The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

languages.text: 德莱夫斯塔家族利用他们在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的关系，不择手段地获取利润，蔑视一切法律，但很少有人注意到这样的变化。
languages.original_text: The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

traits.locale_text: 德莱夫斯塔家族利用他们在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的关系，不择手段地获取利润，蔑视一切法律，但很少有人注意到这样的变化。

languages.text: Die Familie Drivestem nutzte ihre Beziehungen zur Kasballica-Mission und entwickelte sich zu berechnenden und skrupellosen Händlern ohne jede Achtung vor dem Gesetz. Kaum jemandem fiel eine Veränderung auf.
languages.original_text: The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

traits.locale_text: Die Familie Drivestem nutzte ihre Beziehungen zur Kasballica-Mission und entwickelte sich zu berechnenden und skrupellosen Händlern ohne jede Achtung vor dem Gesetz. Kaum jemandem fiel eine Veränderung auf.

languages.text: Les membres de la famille Drivestem mirent à profit leurs relations au sein de la mission de la Kasballica et devinrent des trafiquants calculateurs et sans scrupules méprisant toute loi. Peu remarquèrent le changement.
languages.original_text: The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

traits.locale_text: Les membres de la famille Drivestem mirent à profit leurs relations au sein de la mission de la Kasballica et devinrent des trafiquants calculateurs et sans scrupules méprisant toute loi. Peu remarquèrent le changement.

languages.text: La familia Drivestem utilizó su conexión con la misión Kasballica para convertirse en comerciantes calculadores y amorales en contra de la ley. No muchos notaron la diferencia.
languages.original_text: The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

traits.locale_text: La familia Drivestem utilizó su conexión con la misión Kasballica para convertirse en comerciantes calculadores y amorales en contra de la ley. No muchos notaron la diferencia.

languages.text: ドライブステム一族はカスバリカ聖務団のコネを利用し、法を無視した計算高く悪徳な売人となった。その変化に気づく者はほとんどいなかった。
languages.original_text: The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

traits.locale_text: ドライブステム一族はカスバリカ聖務団のコネを利用し、法を無視した計算高く悪徳な売人となった。その変化に気づく者はほとんどいなかった。

languages.text: Drivestem ailesi, Kasballica Misyonu'ndaki bağlantılarını kullanıp kanunları hiçe sayan, hesapçı ve ilkesiz kaçakçılara dönüştü. Değişimlerini pek fark eden olmadı.
languages.original_text: The Drivestem family used their connections in the Kasballica Mission and became calculating and unscrupulous dealers who spurned the law. Few noticed the change.

traits.locale_text: Drivestem ailesi, Kasballica Misyonu'ndaki bağlantılarını kullandı ve kanunları hiçe sayan, hesapçı ve ilkesiz kaçakçılara dönüştüler. Değişimi fazla kişi fark edemedi.
